parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Vectors
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return object's up vector in world [[Position]] coordinates ( [x, y, z] ) in render time scope.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vectorUpVisual''' objectName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  objectName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[Position]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vUp = [[vectorUpVisual]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vectorUp]], [[vectorDirVisual]], [[vectorDir]], [[setVectorDir]], [[setVectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]], [[vectorDiff]], [[vectorAdd]], [[vectorMultiply]], [[vectorCrossProduct]], [[vectorDistance]], [[vectorMagnitudeSqr]], [[vectorDistanceSqr]], [[vectorCos]], [[vectorMagnitude]], [[vectorDotProduct]], [[vectorNormalized]], [[vectorFromTo]]
</value></part></template>
